item.title: componentversions
item.description: Usage # ocm check componentversions [<options>] {<component-reference>} Options # --fail-on-error fail on validation error -h, --help help for componentversions -R, --local-resources check also for describing resources with local access method, only -S, --local-sources check also for describing sources with local access method, only -o, --output string output mode (JSON, json, wide, yaml) --repo string repository name or spec -s, --sort stringArray sort fields Description # This command checks, whether component versions are completely contained in an OCM repository with all its dependent component references.
